title: International Women’s Day: Shine on those leading the path in the Korean startup ecosystem - KoreaTechDesk | Korean Startup and Technology News

quotes: In 2014, together with her husband and Co-CEO Olivier Duchenne, Eom founded Solidware, a startup that uses big data and machine learning to help financial companies give better credit scores.
Sophie, who has a Master’s Degree focused in Grande-Ecole, Finance major from HEC Paris, was listed on the Forbes Asia 30 Under 30 in 2017.
In May 2021, the fashion unicorn startup Musinsa acquired a 100% stake in StyleShare and 29CM.
Hyerin has managed a national tidal power 100kW commercial plant development project from 2010 to 2013 in Korea.

organizations.name: Styleshare
quotes: Making fashion accessible to all is what Ja-young Yoon, an alumnus of Yonsei University, aimed when she launched her fashion platform Styleshare.
StyleShare is a real-time online and mobile platform where users post their daily fashion looks share the hottest trends in fashion and beauty products.
